channel.title: Aggressive npc's and moving NPC's?
channel.description:
hey guys, im using DefaultScapeV2, and im stuck badly! I need to know how to make aggressive npc's and moving npc's!!
I no i make aggressive NPC's in NPCHandler, but i don't no where!!
This is my autospawn.cfg file just incease you need it! [code]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 1597 2608 3095 0 1 1 1 1 1 wise old man spawn = 1597 2608 3090 0 1 1 1 1 1 wise old man spawn = 510 2597 3105 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop keeper spawn = 521 2595 3105 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop assistant spawn = 522 2593 3105 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop assistant spawn = 532 2591 3105 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop keeper spawn = 1917 2591 3108 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop keeper //end of shops //npc's spawn = 101 2610 3127 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2611 3122 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2613 3121 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2607 3120 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2607 3123 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2603 3127 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2605 3127 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2612 3128 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2617 3130 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin spawn = 101 2614 3132 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
[/code]

item.title: Aggressive npc's and moving NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @Pray_for_plagues Pray for plagues
item.description:
@Pray_for_plagues wrote:

The way I get mine to move is, stand where the npc is spawned then I move 2 spaces Northeast, that is the first x and y. Then I go go back to where it is spawned and move two spaces Southwest and that is the second x and y. That should work if it doesn’t I don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Aggressive npc's and moving NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

2618	3131	2618	3131

It still doesn’t move with those though!!

Read full topic

item.title: Aggressive npc's and moving NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

RangeX1; RangeY1; RangeX2; RangeY2 for randomwalk. However, look in your NPCHandler class to make NPCs agressive.

Read full topic

item.title: Aggressive npc's and moving NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

hey guys, im using DefaultScapeV2, and im stuck badly! I need to know how to make aggressive npc’s and moving npc’s!!

I no i make aggressive NPC’s in NPCHandler, but i don’t no where!!

This is my autospawn.cfg file just incease you need it!

[code]//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 1597 2608 3095 0 1 1 1 1 1 wise old man
spawn = 1597 2608 3090 0 1 1 1 1 1 wise old man
spawn = 510 2597 3105 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop keeper
spawn = 521 2595 3105 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop assistant
spawn = 522 2593 3105 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop assistant
spawn = 532 2591 3105 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop keeper
spawn = 1917 2591 3108 0 1 1 1 1 1 shop keeper
//end of shops
//npc’s
spawn = 101 2610 3127 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2611 3122 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2613 3121 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2607 3120 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2607 3123 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2603 3127 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2605 3127 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2612 3128 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2617 3130 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin
spawn = 101 2614 3132 0 2618 3131 2618 3131 3 goblin

[/code]

Read full topic
